title: Album of Memories
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Look, look, Kanan! There it is~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Woah, you’re right. Good job taking this photo<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, it’s because it’s so rare to see Dia tearing up♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, Dia will probably be angry if she knows there’s something like this hanging around~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Even if Dia would be angry, this picture of the three of us is Mari’s greatest treasure<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I want a copy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! Gladly! Oh, oh, there are other photos too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Wah! You even have something like this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ufufu, it’s my proudest album♪ ….Speaking of which, isn’t Dia kind of late? If she doesn’t come soon, every past photo of her is going to get opened~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>If she knows that, she’ll probably come in a hurry though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! Then, let’s tell her!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Alright, maybe we should send her a peek of this photo with the two of us? Should we give Dia a little surprise?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
